snippet: Isaac Mizrahi is transforming “Peter & the Wolf” at the Guggenheim Museum from concert and art installation to full theatrical production.
abstract: Fashion designer Isaac Mizrahi is transforming Prokofiev's 1936 fable Peter & the Wolf at Guggenheim Museum from concert and art installation to full theatrical production; show has become holiday tradition at museum, with different artists creating installations each year to visually interpret tale, which will be narrated by Mizrahi.
lead_paragraph: Isaac Mizrahi is transforming “Peter & the Wolf” at the Guggenheim Museum from concert and art installation to full theatrical production.

headline.seo: Isaac Mizrahi Directs ‘Peter and the Wolf’ at the Guggenheim
headline.main: Adding a New Note to a Musical Menagerie
headline.print_headline: Adding a New Note To a Musical Menagerie
